title: Freelance Web Developer
description: In my freelance role, I analyze client needs, install websites, and turn Figma designs into user-friendly, responsive websites. I ensure optimal design for various screen sizes, follow SEO standards for better search results, and increase the effectiveness of digital marketing through company profile sites. I also create user-friendly admin panels, allowing clients to easily customize website content and various other types of application systems.

title: Internship at PTIPD UIN Suska Riau
description: During my internship, I actively collaborated with the Application and Data Teams to create the "EMIS UIN Suska" website application. In this role, I played a key part in the development of the application, focusing on efficient reporting of student and lecturer data for UIN Suska Riau to the Indonesian Ministry of Religious Affairs.

title: PT. Garuda Cyber Indonesia
description: I've created many apps, building from scratch and expanding existing apps. My main focus revolves around creating and developing school academic websites. Throughout this process, I became adept at working independently and also thrived in a collaborative environment.
